name: Iggy's Egg Adventure
description: Iggy’s Egg Adventure is a prehistoric platformer 75 million years in the making. You play as Iggy, a baby Velociraptor who must rescue his mother from her evil caveman captors, while collecting as many of her eggs as you can along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: On board graphics (primarily found in laptops) NOT recommended. Supports Microsoft® Xbox 360, and Direct Input compatible controllers.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia: 400 series or above, ATI: 5000 series or above Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Supports Microsoft® Xbox 360, and Direct Input compatible controllers.

reviews.review_text: Iggy's Egg Adventure is the best 3d platformer i have ever played. It was made by 2 people over 2 years and it looks ♥♥♥♥ing incredible!! The story is nice and clear, the gameplay is realy smooth, all the characters are great, adn the game is really ♥♥♥♥ing adorable! I would buy this 20 times if i could. Buy this game you will love it!!!!

This game is great! I know for a fact I doubted it at first because of the graphics (which seem to be a big deal nowadays) but playing this was just fun and cute. I've loved Mario and platformer games since I was a kid, and this game just fit right in.   I love the replayability of it with all the different available characters, plus the costumes are all so cute. For a group of 2 people to make this game alone, it takes a bunch of effort to learn how to model and animate and code all of this. I personally like seeing projects made with Unreal Engine, and seeing how this was made with UDK is even more impressive.   Congratulations to you two, this game is great!

It is a realy good game and has a cute presentation. But I would say it is not a game for children. The levels are huge and need some time to complete, the checkpoints are very rare - so that you often have to play from the very beginning.  The boss-enemies are not so obviouse how th beat them. In other games you get a hint - here you can just guess - and that is very frustrating.

Its looks like a fair expert-difficult game like Donkey Kong Country + Sonic + Mario platformers.   Very cute characters.  Unlockable playble characters.  Excellent graphics, but need a bit works, (I hate to say that, but I'm just pointing out the background) overall its still looks good.  Music is going to be my favour, I'm waiting for Official release...   This game content violence and bloodly effects, its definitely not for little kid. So, make sure to consider it before you buy.
Great platformer with nice graphics, awesome bossfights and tons of blood...

Played this game with my children. Left them alone with it and never once did it crash. Those of you with children can understand how awesome that was. Solid game a lot of fun even for those who aren’t into platformers. Would definitely recommend for those looking to pick up new games for their children’s library and definitely for those who are into time attacks.
Been a long time since I seen a game like this..... And everything dies in pools of blood it's insane.

Rated: 'eC' (Early Childhood)  You're a baby raptor.  Your mom has been kidnapped by hungry ( literally, not sexually ...   probably  ) cavemen .  She will become an egg-breeding machine, unless you stop them   and whoever else who's willing to give her the eggs  !  Prove how loyal of a baby to your mom, you truly are! Take on the adventure! Starve the cavemen. Kick them where it hurts the most.  In the nutsy balls ! Or suffer an ultimate guilt for letting your mom work as an omelette-making machine!  Will you save your mom?  Or will you make her regret not kicking you off the cliff with your brown diapers, when she had the first chance?  Will you make her regret not leaving you to the hungry T-Rex that ate her husband when hunting for dinner.. for you? Will you sadden her even more, reminding her of the chance she had to leave you to sea-beasts? That very day when your grandparents sacrificed themselves to fill the hunger of the beasts so they would let you go.  That my friends, is the ultimate choice each one of you will make!

Im probably lame, but this game gets way too hard too fast. Its cute. I was hoping my kids might be able to enjoy it I will shield them from the pointless frustration. There are many other better more fun platformers out there.  Also, any game that forces you to sit throught a long intro cutscene with no way to skip is off to a bad start for me.  If its a great game I will probably never know as I will be uninstalling it and leaving it in the dust after my 6 min of first impression. Ain't got time for this.
